name: Jack Attack (itch)
description:
After drawing a doodle of Pumpkin Jack, I decided to challenge myself to design and make a  Halloween themed mini-game in just 12 hours! All assets were drawn by myself, excluding the main menu image.

It's my first 12 hour challenge, and I hope you enjoy it! Happy Halloween!

Design/Art/Programming: Puxley

Music/Sound Effects: ZapSplat.com

Font: DaFont.com
